Reviews.Title: A little dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I received my phone quick, quicker than stated online so that was great. But when I got the phone the battery part where you can tell if its been wet or not was red so it had been wet, then on the inside it was pretty torn up which doesnt mean anythings wrongwith the way it works but scares me for how it will work later.I should have read through the whole things because the title is New Blackberry Curve, but the content states it is basically refurbished...which is fine but I wouldnt have paid $50 for a refurbished phone I would have paid $32....which is how much the average one is on here for that exact phone.

Reviews.Title: Mediocre Quality for a used product
Reviews.Author: Ben M. Evardome "Ben Evardome"
Reviews.Content: For a used product, the item wasn't really to my expectations. The address book disappeared from the icon menu for no reason and I had to do a hard reset which fixed the problem. Other than that, the phone works ok.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Kev
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this cell phone I purchased. It is still working great and the low price I paid is just a fantastic BARGAIN!!!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry curve 8330
Reviews.Author: Monique
Reviews.Content: Sold me a broke phone. No charger and will not charge! Horrible! He is ignorant when in contact with him and tOld him my problem!

Reviews.Title: unusable mobile phone
Reviews.Author: mlgkansas
Reviews.Content: I received a blackberry from this vendor and although it appeared to be in good condition, I was not able to activate.  The phone had a bad ESN number.

Reviews.Title: defective phone
Reviews.Author: blessed
Reviews.Content: Received phone in good order and on time. Phone appeared to be as promised but after a couple weeks use the scroll ball detached.

Reviews.Title: that is what is it guys
Reviews.Author: mkoujan
Reviews.Content: First of all , this is NOT a NEW phone , this is a OK used phone. Second, I really cant connect the phone to the computer so i really cant sync or update the phone ,and that's SUCKS. Other than that, everything is OK ... delivery was faaaasssst and something else that you guys wanna be careful about is dont think that you will get an actual Blackberry charger ( Original ),or (USP charger Original) .

Reviews.Title: Bad buy
Reviews.Author: Shelby Stearman
Reviews.Content: The seller left all the pictures, messages, contacts etc. is the phone, didn't come with charger and the scroller barely worked, would NOT recommend.

Reviews.Title: Unable to activate on Sprint, Seller wanted me to pay return shipping..
Reviews.Author: Lukes Dad "DIY Fixit guy. Why pay someone els...
Reviews.Content: While this phone says Sprint right on the face of it, it appears it was a South American market phoneand cannot be activated in the North American market. When I asked for a refund seller would not pick up thereturn shipping charges. I then read all the seller reviews. Guess what I figured out. Seller has sold more thenone of these that will not activate. It then occurred to me that I had the one that will not activate.I decided to just go ahead and THROW IT IN THE GARBAGE. This way no one Else's time and money will be wasted.Pete

Reviews.Title: Old but works.
Reviews.Author: Sharon M.
Reviews.Content: Not bad, for the price.  Just very old.  Couldn't get on the internet and couldn't get access to my emails...but an okay 'interim' phone...don't plan on making this your permanent phone.
